review: I love this!! It's so easy to use. We also have an Apple TV as well which is in the front room where we don't run a cable box. We put this in the main living room and it's so much easier for me to navigate!! All I have to do is hit the home button and BOOM there it is. It's kinda like a Droid vs iPhone in my opinion when comparing Fire Stick to Apple TV navigation. I can easily locate what I am looking for in shows, NextFlix etc. The Original Series have been pretty good. I really like Catastrophe and I hope more episodes come out soon!!! HILARIOUS!My only CON:When viewing a series, you have to locate the seasons individually. Unlike Netflix where you can click to find more seasons and flip between those. It would be nice to be able to roll into the next season rather than having to look for it. Sometimes I am not sure how many seasons something is so it's nice to be able to see all of that at once instead of wasting time searching for something.
